backstory_1.title: Level 1 Page 1
paragraphs: For decades, space operations have been conducted beyond public knowledge.
Hidden behind classified budgets and blacked-out reports.
Officially, they explore distant worlds in the name of science and progress.
Charting stars. Mapping anomalies. Expanding the frontier.

backstory_2.title: Level 1 Page 2
paragraphs: However, some missions uncover signals, structures, and energies that defy known physics—
—things humanity was never meant to find.
